definitions.definition: Any of various tropical (Central and South) American vines of the genus Smilax , such as Smilax aspera , which have fragrant roots .
Dried roots of these plants, or a flavoring material extracted from these roots.
A beverage ( soft drink ) flavored with this root, such as root beer .
Any of several North American plants , of the genus Aralia , having umbels and small white flowers.

main_definition: Any of various tropical (Central and South) American vines of the genus Smilax , such as Smilax aspera , which have fragrant roots .

Any of several North American plants , of the genus Aralia , having umbels and small white flowers.
